Class FileManager

java.lang.Object
bto.Controllers.FileManager
public class FileManager extends Object
Manages file operations for the BTO system including loading and saving data.

This class handles persistence operations for all entity types in the system, reading data from and writing data to text files. It provides methods for loading and saving users, projects, applications, enquiries, bookings, and other entities.

  • Method Details

    • loadAllUsers

      public List<User> loadAllUsers()
      Loads all users from files into a combined list.
      Returns:
      A list containing all applicants, officers, and managers

    • loadApplicants

      public List<Applicant> loadApplicants()
      Loads applicant data from file.
      Returns:
      A list of all applicants found in the data file

    • loadOfficers

      public List<HDBOfficer> loadOfficers()
      Loads HDB officer data from file.
      Returns:
      A list of all HDB officers found in the data file

    • loadManagers

      public List<HDBManager> loadManagers()
      Loads HDB manager data from file.
      Returns:
      A list of all HDB managers found in the data file

    • loadProjects

      public List<Project> loadProjects(List<HDBOfficer> loadedOfficers, List<HDBManager> loadedManagers)
      Loads project data from file and establishes relationships with managers and officers.
      Parameters:
      loadedOfficers - The list of HDB officers to associate with projects
      loadedManagers - The list of HDB managers to associate with projects
      Returns:
      A list of all projects with their associated managers and officers

    • loadApplications

      public List<ProjectApplication> loadApplications(List<Applicant> applicants, List<Project> projects)
      Loads application data from file and establishes relationships with applicants and projects.
      Parameters:
      applicants - The list of applicants to associate with applications
      projects - The list of projects to associate with applications
      Returns:
      A list of all project applications

    • loadEnquiries

      public List<Enquiry> loadEnquiries(List<Applicant> applicants, List<Project> projects, List<User> allUsers)
      Loads enquiry data from file and establishes relationships with applicants, projects, and users.
      Parameters:
      applicants - The list of applicants who may have submitted enquiries
      projects - The list of projects that enquiries may be about
      allUsers - The list of all users for finding responders
      Returns:
      A list of all enquiries

    • loadOfficerRegistrations

      public List<OfficerRegistration> loadOfficerRegistrations(List<HDBOfficer> officers, List<Project> projects)
      Loads officer registration data from file and establishes relationships with officers and projects.
      Parameters:
      officers - The list of officers to associate with registrations
      projects - The list of projects to associate with registrations
      Returns:
      A list of all officer registrations

    • loadBookings

      public List<FlatBooking> loadBookings(List<Applicant> applicants, List<Project> projects, List<HDBOfficer> officers)
      Loads flat bookings from file
      Parameters:
      applicants - List of loaded applicants for reference linking
      projects - List of loaded projects for reference linking
      Returns:
      List of all bookings loaded from file

    • loadReceipts

      public List<Receipt> loadReceipts(List<Applicant> applicants, List<Project> projects)
      Loads receipts from file
      Parameters:
      applicants - List of loaded applicants for reference linking
      projects - List of loaded projects for reference linking
      Returns:
      List of all receipts loaded from file

      Loads withdrawal requests from file
      Parameters:
      applicants - List of loaded applicants for reference linking
      applications - List of loaded applications for reference linking
      Returns:
      List of all withdrawals loaded from file

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true if the save was successful, false otherwise
